articles.title: Biden says US aims for 'return to normalcy' by Fourth of July in first TV address – live - The Guardian
articles.description: Biden said his administration will push states and local governments to make all adults eligible for the vaccine by 1 May

articles.title: Biden slammed for taking credit for COVID-19 vaccine, not thanking Trump - New York Post
articles.description: Pundits took aim at Biden for trying “to take credit for everything that Donald Trump did on COVID-19.”
